exercises.movement: Banded Double Squat Pulse with Leg Lift
exercises.notes: Band above knees. Squat down low. Come back up halfway. Squat down low again. Stand up fully and lift one leg out to the side.
Lie on the floor face up. Dumbbell on groin. Feet flat on the ground. Press your hips up into the air and lower back down.

Band above knees. Hold dumbbell at your chest. Bend forward keeping back straight and knees slightly bent. When back is parallel with the floor, lower your butt down into a squat position and then reverse the exercise.
Dumbbell at chest.
Dumbbell in each hand. lower down into a deadlift position, knees slightly bent and back straight, come back up to standing with upper body at about a 45-degree angle and then lower back down.

exercises.movement: Banded Fire Hydrants to Donkey Kick

exercises.notes: Dumbbell or resistance band. Kneel onto right knee supporting yourself with your left foot. Hold the dumbbell over your right shoulder and press up.
Dumbbell in each hand. Palms facing you, hold arms at a 90-degree angle and press up until your arms are straight.
Resistance band at bottom of a door or heavy object. Raise arms up and outward into a Y shape. Dumbbells can be used into same motion.

exercises.movement: 1.5 Banded Dumbbell Front Squat with Calf Raise
exercises.notes: Band above knees. Dumbbells resting on shoulders. Lower down into a squat, stand up halfway, lower back down, then stand up fully. While coming up onto the balls of your feet.
Dumbbell in each hand. Put one foot on a bench or box. Stand up onto the platform fully on one leg, then SLOWLY lower yourself back down.
Dumbbells on shoulders. Get into a lunge position. Lower down until rear shin is parallel with the floor then stand back up.
Dumbbell on knees
Hop over onto your right foot, bringing your left knee up and towards your right elbow. Then onto your left foot.
Jump out into a squat then back in.
Perform a burpee. Then jump and make a 180-degree turn.
Lie face up on the floor or bench. Dumbbell in each hand and overhead, pull them straight up and over your chest. Keep dumbbells pressed together and lower towards your chest.
Lie face up on the floor. Push hips up into a bridge position. Bring arms straight over your chest then lower down and out to the sides until parallel with the floor.
Using two chairs or risers, get into a pushup position. Lower yourself down until your chest is in line with both chairs. Push yourself back up and repeat.
Perform a bent over row. Pause at the top of the motion and hold for 3 seconds. SLOWLY lower back down.
Dumbbells or resistance band
Seated

Dumbbells or Kettlebells. Feet a little wider than shoulder width, lean forward with back straight until you are able to grab dumbbells. Row one dumbbell up and place it back on the floor then repeat with the other. Continue alternating.
Dumbbells
Hands on dumbbells

exercises.movement: Banded Double Squat Pulse with Leg Lift
exercises.notes: Barbell or Dumbbells. Band above knees. Squat down low. Come back up halfway. Squat down low again. Stand up fully and lift one leg out to the side.
Lie on the floor face up. Dumbbell on groin. Feet flat on the ground. Press your hips up into the air and lower back down.

Band above knees. Hold barbell on your back. Bend forward keeping back straight and knees slightly bent. When back is parallel with the floor, lower your butt down into a squat position and then reverse the exercise.
Barbell on back or dumbbell at chest.
Barbell. Lower down into a deadlift position, knees slightly bent and back straight, come back up to standing with upper body at about a 45-degree angle and then lower back down.

exercises.movement: Banded Fire Hydrants to Donkey Kick

exercises.notes: Smith machine. Kneel onto right knee supporting yourself with your left foot. Hold the bar over your right shoulder and press up.
Palms facing you, hold arms at a 90-degree angle and press up until your arms are straight.
Cable machine. Raise arms up and outward into a Y shape. Dumbbells can be used into same motion.
Barbell
Band above knees. Barbell in front rack position. Lower down into a squat, stand up halfway, lower back down, then stand up fully.
Dumbbell in each hand. Put one foot on a bench or box. Stand up onto the platform fully on one leg, then SLOWLY lower yourself back down.
Toes at the bottom of the platform.
Barbell front rack position. Get into a lunge position. Lower down until rear shin is parallel with the floor then stand back up.
Machine or dumbbell or barbell on knees
Hop over onto your right foot, bringing your left knee up and towards your right elbow. Then onto your left foot.
Jump out into a squat then back in.
Perform a burpee. Then jump and make a 180-degree turn.
Lie face up on the floor or bench. Dumbbell in each hand and overhead, pull them straight up and over your chest. Keep dumbbells pressed together and lower towards your chest.
Barbell
Decline bench. Bring arms straight over your chest then lower down and out to the sides until parallel with the floor.
Using two benches or risers, get into a pushup position. Lower yourself down until your chest is in line with both benches. Push yourself back up and repeat.
Perform a bent over row. Pause at the top of the motion and hold for 3 seconds. SLOWLY lower back down.
Dumbbells or cable machine.
Cable or machine
Machine

Barbell on the floor in front of you. Bend at the waist with back straight and parallel with the floor, knees slightly bent, and neck neutral. Grab the bar with both hands slightly outside shoulder width. Pull the bar up to your chest and lower back down allowing the weight to rest back on the floor.
Barbell
Hands on dumbbells
Dumbbells on shoulders. Squat down then back up, then into a forward lunge.
Start in a low squat position. Kneel onto your right knee and then onto your left. Then bring your left foot back up and then your right back into a low squat position. Down and up is one rep.
Band above knees. Attach resistance band to a heavy object or bottom of a door. Grab handles and take 4 steps back and then 4 steps forward for 1 rep.
Stand in front of a chair and raise left leg off the floor while balancing on the right. Gently lower yourself down onto the seat keeping your left leg up. Stand back up on your right leg only.
Dumbbell in each hand. Step right leg back and slightly out to the side. Lower down into a squat keeping most of the weight in your left heel. Stand back up. Rear foot is only for support.
Dumbbells

Sit upright with core engaged. Bring both arms up to a 90-degree angle with a dumbbell in each hand. Keeping your right arm at a 90-degree angle, simultaneously press up with the left arm. Perform all reps then repeat with the right arm.
Grab one end of the dumbbell. Swing the dumbbell back between your legs and then up and overhead.

High plank position and place your feet on a chair or similar. Keeping your hands shoulder width apart and core tight, walk your hands in towards your feet as far as you can then back out into a plank position.
Attach at the bottom of a door or under your feet.
Dumbbells. Keep arms straight. Bring dumbbells up and out to your sides and up overhead in a big circle motion and back down.

Dumbbells in each hand with underhand grip. hold each out to your sides. keeping palms facing up, raise both hands up with straight arms in front of you until they meet in the middle of your chest. lower and repeat.
Resistance band
Neutral grip. Arms close to your sides.
Dumbbells

Hold a dumbbell at your chest and stand with feet wide and toes pointed outward. Squat down over to your right side, keeping your chest up and left leg straight. Come back up then repeat the same on the left side. Continue alternating.
Hold one dumbbell with both hands and feet a little wider than shoulder width apart. Bend at the waist keeping back straight and reach the dumbbell back between your legs and stand back up.
Band above knees. Get down on all fours. Keeping your right foot flexed and leg at a 90-degree angle, kick back and then lower your leg back down.

exercises.movement: Feet Elevated Straight Leg Glute Bridge
exercises.notes: Lie face up and place the heels of your feet on an elevated surface. Keeping your legs straight, press your hips up. Keep your core and glutes engaged. Lower back down.
Use resistance band attached to a heavy object or use a booty band above the knees.
Band above knees. Squat down just a bit. Then take a big step to the right and then to the left. Repeat for a reps.
Dumbbells in each hand. Seated or standing, bend forward at the waist and keep back straight. Lift arms up and out to the sides and lower back down.
Dumbbells
Keep mind-muscle connection focused on your back.
Resistance band at the top of a door. Pull down with straight arms.
Palms facing you.

exercises.movement: Banded Jump Squat with Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Band above knees. Dumbbells on shoulders in front rack position. Squat down and jump up. As you come out of the squat, use the momentum to drive both dumbbells up and overhead. Bring them back down to your shoulders and repeat.
Forearm plank. Twist your torso and drop your left hip down to the floor. Return to the low plank position and repeat on the other side. Continue alternating.
Lower yourself down onto the floor from starting pushup position. While on the floor, lift both hands slightly off the floor and then back onto the floor and press yourself back up.
Barbell. Squat down then back up, then into a forward lunge.
Start in a low squat position. Kneel onto your right knee and then onto your left. Then bring your left foot back up and then your right back into a low squat position. Down and up is one rep.
Band above knees. Using a rope of bar attachment. Grab handles and take 4 steps back and then 4 steps forward for 1 rep.

Stand in front of a bench or box and raise left leg off the floor while balancing on the right. Gently lower yourself down onto the seat keeping your left leg up. Stand back up on your right leg only.
Dumbbells. Step right leg back and slightly out to the side. Lower down into a squat keeping most of the weight in your left heel. Stand back up. Rear foot is only for support.
Dumbbells or barbell
Smith machine or calf raise machine

Sit upright with core engaged. Bring both arms up to a 90-degree angle with a dumbbell in each hand. Keeping your right arm at a 90-degree angle, simultaneously press up with the left arm. Perform all reps then repeat with the right arm.
Grab handle of the kettlebell. Swing the dumbbell back between your legs and then up and overhead.

High plank position and place your feet on a bench or similar. Keeping your hands shoulder width apart and core tight, walk your hands in towards your feet as far as you can then back out into a plank position.
Handle attachments. Step forward slightly. Keep palms facing up, raise both hands up with straight arms in front of you until they meet in the middle of your chest. Lower and repeat.
Straight bar
Dumbbells or cable
Straight barbell or EZ bar

Hold a dumbbell at your chest and stand with feet wide and toes pointed outward. Squat down over to your right side, keeping your chest up and left leg straight. Come back up and then repeat the same on the left side. Continue alternating.
Rope attachment in both hands and feet a little wider than shoulder width apart. Bend at the waist keeping back straight and reach the dumbbell back between your legs and stand back up.
Smith machine. Get down on all fours. Keeping your right foot flexed and leg at a 90-degree angle, kick back and then lower your leg back down.
Dumbbell or barbell

exercises.movement: Feet Elevated Straight Leg Glute Bridge
exercises.notes: Lie face up and place the heels of your feet on an elevated surface. Keeping your legs straight, press your hips up. Keep your core and glutes engaged. Lower back down.
Band above knees. Squat down just a bit. Then take a big step to the right and then to the left. Repeat for a reps.
Dumbbells in each hand. Seated or standing, bend forward at the waist and keep back straight. Lift arms up and out to the sides and lower back down.
Barbell
Wide grip. Keep back straight.
Cable machine. Straight bar.
Palms facing you.

exercises.movement: Banded Jump Squat with Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Band above knees. Dumbbells on shoulders in front rack position. Squat down and jump up. As you come out of the squat, use the momentum to drive both dumbbells up and overhead. Bring them back down to your shoulders and repeat.
Forearm plank. Twist your torso and drop your left hip down to the floor. Return to the low plank position and repeat on the other side. Continue alternating.
Lower yourself down onto the floor from starting pushup position. While on the floor, lift both hands slightly off the floor and then back onto the floor and press yourself back up.

With the barbell on the floor in front of you, bend at the waist with back straight and parallel to the floor, knees slightly bent, and neutral neck. Grab the bar slightly outside shoulder width. Pull the bar up to your chest and lower back down allowing the weight to rest back on the floor.
Cable
V-Bar attachment on cable
Cable or machine

exercises.movement: Front Foot Elevated Barbell Reverse Lunge
exercises.notes: Stand on a weight plate with barbell on back
Barbell on back
Dumbbells or barbell
With or without band
Barbell or EZ Bar.
Dumbbell
EZ bar or barbell. Palms facing down.
Smith Machine
Barbell in front rack position. Heels on weighted plates.
Barbell on back. Complete one side at a time or alternate.
Barbell on back. Wide stance with toes pointed outward. Squat down low, come back up halfway, squat back down, then stand up fully.
Leg press or calf extension machine
Dumbbells
Dumbbell in each hand. Neutral grip. Raise straight arms out in front of you in a wide V until arms are in line with shoulders. Lower back down and repeat.
Keep core tight and back straight.
Incline bench
Hands on dumbbells
Dumbbell
Assisted pull up machine
Weighted plate on the small of your back.
